name: Binary Dungeon
description:
Collect the 3 Crystals of Balance to restore peace to the void that is the Binary Land!

This is a game for the Mini Game Jam 71, my first game jam. It combines puzzle and strategy with top-down shooting, and is completely black and white, not even gray. It is insanely difficult (at least to me), and I was running out of time, so I couldn't complete a full run of it. If you have issues, please let me know.
